caption:
A VERY SAD STORY…
(Read to the end)

KIESHELL reached out to me on IG from AUCKLAND,NEW ZEALAND 🇳🇿 

She wanted a very beautiful dress for an event.
She wanted to standout, looking beautiful and of course waist snatched!

She wanted a luxury orange fabric,after some days,l was able to get her desired fabric, sent her videos, she approved it, we had a virtual measurement and I got to work.

Few days later,we sent her videos of the base of the dress,she was totally in love.

Fast forward, the dress was fully ready, sent her videos and pictures and she was blown away
In her words 
“this is my dress? I really get to wear this wow I’m so grateful thank you SO SO much I’m IN LOVE already”

We agreed to send the dress on a particular date but somehow,the creative director said no,we needed to ship the dress two days before the agreed date because she wanted Kieshell to get the dress days before her event.

We informed Kieshell and she agreed,we proceeded with the shipment.
We do a lot of deliveries with Dhl and in most cases these dresses get delivered before the estimated date of delivery.

But this time,it was a different story,the dress arrived in New Zealand a day after the estimated date of delivery,customs held on to the dress for 3days!!!

According to them,packages from Africa needs to be thoroughly checked,the dress has already been checked by Germany customs before it got to New Zealand.

After 3days with New Zealand custom,the dress was finally delivered to Kieshell.

Kieshell didn’t get to wear the dress for the event,she was heartbroken but in all of these she never insulted me or the brand.

Yeah she loved her dress!!!
And of course the DRESS FIT PERFECTLY!!!
Shipped to NEW ZEALAND 🇳🇿 
NO FITTINGS! NO ALTERATIONS!!!
 
Goodnews;
she shared with me that she will be need the dress for a bigger event which is more special to her.

Quite a sad story but maybe a BLESSING IN DISGUISE!
(I will definitely share the testimony with you all later,God willing!)

Dress @ewasvogue 
Ewasvogue doll @just_kiessshell ❤️
Fabric @asoebilounge
